CSSPrimitiveValueGetCounterValue.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The getCounterValue() method of the
interface is used to get the counter
value. If this CSS value doesn't contain a counter value, a
is raised. Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the
interface.

blockquote.para:
Note: This method was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSPrimitiveValueGetCounterValue.returns: A object representing the counter value.
